content:
AssetCreationOptions AssetCreationOptions Enum

In this Article

Edit

Specifies the the different options that an IAsset can be created with.

Syntax

Declaration

[Flags]
public enum AssetCreationOptions<Flags>
Public Enum AssetCreationOptions

Remarks

This is a flags enum.

Fields

CommonEncryptionProtected
CommonEncryptionProtected

Specifies that an assets files are protected using a common encryption method (such as PlayReady).
EnvelopeEncryptionProtected
EnvelopeEncryptionProtected

Specifies that an assets files are protected using a Envelope encryption method (such as AES-CBC).
None
None

Specifies no asset creation options.
StorageEncrypted
StorageEncrypted

Specifies that an asset's files should be encrypted on for upload and storage when creating the asset.

Attributes

System.FlagsAttribute

Details

Namespace

Microsoft.WindowsAzure.MediaServices.Client

Assembly

Microsoft.WindowsAzure.MediaServices.Client.dll
